short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a countdown timer for upcoming events or deadlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make every moment count with Event Countdown! This sleek and modern extension helps you create customized countdowns for your special events. Whether it's a birthday party 🎂, wedding 💍, vacation ✈️, or a big meeting 🗓️, Event Countdown keeps you on track in style.

🛠️ Features:
Personalized Event Names: Add a unique touch by naming your event!
Custom Countdown Date & Time: Set the exact moment you’re looking forward to.
Real-Time Updates: Watch the timer tick down in days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
Polished Design: Sleek animations and a clean interface make your countdown visually appealing.
Celebratory Message: Get a cheerful surprise when the countdown reaches zero 🎉.
Never lose sight of what matters most. Let Event Countdown keep your excitement alive—one second at a time!

✨ Start your countdown today! 🕒
